summary: This is a female Light Armor Set, Includes armor,boots, gloves, and helm. Craftable under Bonemold.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Daedric Freak Armor BBP
Author: Edhildil
06,14,2014
ver1

Please read the whole description before you comment so you understand what this mod is.


[youtube]ds30dPh-Pm4[/youtube]


[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is a female Light Armor Set, Includes armor,boots, gloves, and helm. Craftable under Bonemold.

The armor is weighted for BBP. There is also a Chest (Freak Pod) in the water with one set in it in Raven Rock by the dock stairs.

The lowerbody has been enhanced in the derrier region (buttock)
for a fuller, rounder profile. The waist is somewhat thinner.
The breasts are medium sized.

This is a custom body shape, so the weight sliders will not work at all. Why? Because every time I try to use weight sliders my computer CTD's.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Dragonborn DLC.

Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game (textures).
Or Unp textures for sevenbase vesion

BBP skeleton and animations. No BBP skeleton and you will CTD.

[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


Uninstallation:

Delete EdhildilsDaedricFreakArmor esp.
Delete datameshesarmoredhildilhermora folder
Delete datatexturesarmoredhildilhermora folder

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Sevennity for Sevenbase
Edhildil
Bethesda

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
Microsoft Paint (BMP to JPEG for screenies)


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
